msItem.title: [Unknown].
msItem.note: The entry is written on a page inserted in the Library copy of Codrington, before p. 545. No number is given to it there. 367 (bis) is here assigned to it. Pp. 669-1513. Needs to be traced. Evidently not seen by Reade. Said to be an odd volume.

acquisition.p: Provenance: Sir Sidney Smith, according to the entry.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
